author: glenn
msg: Final refactoring, reformatting of source, and review for compliance
with JSP custom tag lifecycle to ensure tags work in containers
like Tomcat 4.1 which use custom tag pooling.

the i18n taglib in JSP containers which implement custom tag pooling.
